CAMPAIGN_NAME: Field contamination of the starfish Asterias rubens by metals in Sørfjord, Norway
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Sediment samples were taken by scuba divers below the halocline using a polyvinyl chloride corer. The top 5 cm layer was collected in polyethylene containers and stored at -20°C

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Field contamination of the starfish Asterias rubens by metals in Sørfjord, Norway
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Starfish were collected by scuba divers and placed in tanks filled with their surrounding water. Tanks were hermetically sealed to avoid osmotic shock due to vertical salinity gradient

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Field contamination of the starfish Asterias rubens by metals in Sørfjord, Norway
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Cd, Cu, and Pb analyzed by graphite furnace electrothermic atomic absorption spectrometry (EAAS) using a Varian GTA100 SpectrAA 640Z spectrometer. Chemical modifiers used: 0.018% Pd, 0.009% Mg, and 0.009% P

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Field contamination of the starfish Asterias rubens by metals in Sørfjord, Norway
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Samples were mineralised by high-pressure microwave method using a Milestone 1200 mega microwave oven. 2.5 ml of Suprapur HNO3 and 1 ml of 30% Suprapur H2O2 were added to Teflon containers with dried samples

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Field contamination of the starfish Asterias rubens by metals in Sørfjord, Norway
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Samples were mineralised by high-pressure microwave method using a Milestone 1200 mega microwave oven. 2.5 ml of Suprapur HNO3 and 1 ml of 30% Suprapur H2O2 were added to Teflon containers with dried samples
